segments.text: Hi , Alex . How are you doing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just fine , Karen . I ’ m just taking a breather from all this paper work !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know the feeling . I ’ m calling to let you know about this new Italian place I found . It ’ s right around the corner .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ ll have to try it . You know how I am about Italian food ! What ’ s the name ?
segments.speaker: S2
